documentation.author: Christopher Canida
documentation.purpose: To remove the assessment status, for any one of the conditions, from the Quality Measures MPage by posting a Remove Assessment clinical event. Documentation of this event will remove the assessment status until another qualifying assessment event occurs.
documentation.explanation: Rule will be called from the Quality Measures MPage and passed the condition name along with the result to post. AMI, HF, PN, CAC, VTE,STROKE, SCIP
documentation.impact:
The following needs to be addressed at each client site:
ALL ACTIONS
VALUE1 - needs to be reinstantiated
documentation.citation: Non-regulatory enhancement to Quality Measures MPage

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_SYNCH_TRIGGER_E
templateDefinitions.definition: the Expert Synch trigger is listed in TRIGGER.

statements.statement: select trigger_name="Double click in lower box to enter trigger name(s)" from (dummyt d with seq = 1)

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CALC_SAVE_L
templateDefinitions.description: Create a value to be used by subsequent templates

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_CE_CREATE_CODED_CE_A
templateDefinitions.definition: Create a STATUS, OPT_NORMALCY, EVENT_NAME result of VALUE1 OPT_UNITS_OF_MEASURE on the same encounter as LINK with OPT_COMMENT_TYPE of OPT_COMMENT and RESEND send this event back through Discern Expert. OPT_INHERIT_DYN_LABEL inherit the dynamic label, if one exisits.

templateDefinitions.name: EKS_STOP_ACTION_A
templateDefinitions.definition: STOP execution of subsequent action groups.
templateDefinitions.description: Stop execution of subsequent action groups
